name: map3d
description: üó∫Ô∏è Generate City 3D map with R3F. Include building and road information.
readme_summary: This repository provides a 3D building mapping service using React-Three-Fiber and OpenStreetMap data.  It allows exporting maps as GLB files and has potential applications in digital twin creation, drone surveying, and GPS marker integration.  The accuracy of the data depends on OpenStreetMap, and future improvements include manual data correction and enhanced customization options.

name: Maestro
description: Painless E2E Automation for Mobile and Web
readme_summary: Maestro is a UI testing framework designed for mobile and web applications.  It addresses common testing challenges like flakiness and delays with built-in tolerance mechanisms and uses a declarative YAML syntax for efficient test definition.  Its single binary architecture ensures easy setup and cross-platform compatibility.
key_features: Built-in tolerance to flakiness in UI elements and screen taps
Built-in tolerance to delays without needing `sleep()` calls
Blazingly fast iteration with interpreted tests and continuous monitoring
Declarative YAML syntax for test definition
primary_use_case: UI testing framework for mobile and web applications

name: nfcgate
description: An NFC research toolkit application for Android
readme_summary: NFCGate is an Android application for capturing, analyzing, and modifying NFC traffic.  It supports various modes including relay, replay, and cloning, and allows exporting data in the pcapng format for further analysis with tools like Wireshark.  This application is intended for security research purposes.
key_features: NFC traffic relay between two devices using a server
Export of captured traffic in pcapng format readable by Wireshark
primary_use_case: Security research: reverse engineering and security assessment of NFC protocols

name: faiss
description: A library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors.
readme_summary: Faiss is a library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors.  It supports various algorithms, including GPU-accelerated options, and offers a range of indexing structures to optimize for different performance needs.  It's designed to handle datasets of any size and provides interfaces in both C++ and Python.
key_features: Efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors
Handles vectors of any size, including those that don't fit in RAM
Algorithms implemented on GPU for faster processing
Supports L2 distance, dot products, and cosine similarity
Provides various indexing structures with different trade-offs between search time, quality, memory usage, and training time
Includes exact and approximate nearest neighbor search
Supports CUDA, AMD ROCm, and cuVS for GPU acceleration
primary_use_case: Similarity search and clustering of dense vectors

name: pensieve
description: A passive recording project allows you to have complete control over your data. Automatically take screenshots of all your screens, index them, and save them locally.
readme_summary: Pensieve is a privacy-focused application that records screen activity, indexes it for searching, and provides a web interface for access.  It uses local storage to maintain user data privacy and integrates with Ollama and OpenAI APIs for enhanced functionality.  Supports full-text and vector search for efficient retrieval of recorded content.
key_features: Mac and Windows support (Linux in development)
primary_use_case: Privacy-focused screen recording and retrieval system

name: chatbox
description: User-friendly Desktop Client App for AI Models/LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Ollama...)
readme_summary: Chatbox is a desktop and mobile application that allows users to interact with various large language models.  It offers versions for Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops, as well as iOS and Android mobile platforms.  The application aims to provide a user-friendly interface for accessing the capabilities of LLMs.
key_features: Desktop client for ChatGPT, Claude and other LLMs
primary_use_case: Provides a desktop and mobile client for interacting with large language models like ChatGPT and Claude.

name: afrog
description: A Security Tool for Bug Bounty, Pentest and Red Teaming.
readme_summary: Afrog is a security tool designed for bug bounty hunting, penetration testing, and red teaming activities.  It helps in identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities.  The tool is actively developed and maintained, with contributions from multiple developers.
primary_use_case: A security tool for vulnerability research and exploitation

name: SDL
readme_summary: The Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL) is a cross-platform library designed to simplify the creation of multimedia applications, including games and emulators.  It offers ease of use and broad compatibility across different operating systems.  SDL's primary purpose is to provide a streamlined interface for handling various multimedia tasks.
key_features: Ease of use for multimedia software development
Support for game and emulator development
primary_use_case: Development of multimedia software, such as games and emulators

name: docuseal
description: Open source DocuSign alternative. Create, fill, and sign digital documents ‚úçÔ∏è
readme_summary: DocuSeal is an open-source platform for secure digital document signing and processing.  It allows users to create and manage fillable PDF forms with various field types, supports multiple submitters, and offers integrations via API and webhooks.  Deployment is simplified through Docker and various cloud platforms.
key_features: 12 field types available (Signature, Date, File, Checkbox etc.)
Files storage on disk or AWS S3, Google Storage, Azure Cloud
6 UI languages with signing available in 13 languages
Invitation and identify verification via SMS
Bulk send with CSV, XLSX spreadsheet import
Template creation with PDF or DOCX and field tags API
primary_use_case: Open source document filling and signing
